comment_text: Great video. Props to the guy in it who makes it much more followable with his clear voice and simple teaching
this vid 3 years old 5 comments and i still suck at math

For constant increments in x, a linear growth would increase by a constant difference, and an exponential growth would increase by a constant ratio.

The words that correspond to the 4 basic symbols of addition, subtraction, multiplication and division and the associated words are
Sum + addition
Difference - subtraction
Product x multiplication
Ratio / division
